mapper.sql: freight_template_id, freight_template_name, freight_city_id, freight_province_id, freight_county_id, freight_package_mail, freight_methods, freight_restri_area, freight_is_default, freight_del_flag, freight_third_id, freight_create_time, freight_modify_time, freight_remark, freight_no_delete
mapper.select:
select from np_freight_template where 1=1 and freight_del_flag = '0'
and freight_template_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{freightTemplateName},'%'))
and freight_del_flag = #{freightDelFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}
and freight_third_id = #{freightThirdId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by freight_is_default,freight_create_time desc

select
from np_freight_template where freight_template_id = #{freightTemplateId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and freight_del_flag = '0'

select
from np_freight_template where freight_is_default = #{freightIsDefault,jdbcType=CHAR} and freight_third_id = #{freightThirdId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and freight_del_flag = '0'

freight_template_name = #{freightTemplateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
